name: HHHHHHH
description:
Made within 48 hours during Global Game Jam 2023.

A father protects his son who survived a Root zombie attack and roams the whole country. Searching far and wide to find a cure. 

Controls: 

Move: WASD 

Shoot: Left mouse button 

Switch Weapon: Scrollwheel 

Reload: R 

Plant ammo seed: Right mouse button while looking down 

Pick up the grown ammo: E
